ThingDef.label: diamond honeycomb
ThingDef.description: This is a honeycomb produced by diamond bees. Diamond bees are gemstone-looking insects that extract small amounts of Jade from their environment and transmute it slowly into Diamond. Honeycombs can be processed in a Honey Extractor to get honey, steelwax and diamond.

ThingDef.label: ruby honeycomb
ThingDef.description: This is a honeycomb produced by ruby bees. Ruby bees are gemstone-looking insects that extract small amounts of Jade from their environment and transmute it slowly into Ruby. Honeycombs can be processed in a Honey Extractor to get to get honey, steelwax and rubies.

ThingDef.label: sapphire honeycomb
ThingDef.description: This is a honeycomb produced by sapphire bees. Sapphire bees are gemstone-looking insects that extract small amounts of Jade from their environment and transmute it slowly into Sapphire. Honeycombs can be processed in a Honey Extractor to get to get honey, steelwax and sapphire.
